titles.title: To ensure that members of Congress participate on an equal basis with their constituents in the health care system that results from health care reform legislation.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S11933-11934)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

bill.summary: 9/15/1993--Introduced. Urges all Members of Congress to enroll in a standard health care plan available at their home of record that charges no more than the average premium for the area and to publicly disclose, on an annual basis, the health care plans in which they have enrolled.
